headline: CAPR Updates FDA on Deramiocel BLA, Plans HOPE-3 CSR Filing in February
summary: CAPR said the FDA wants the full HOPE-3 study report for Deramiocel and confirmed no new clinical trials are needed.

headline: Here's Why You Should Hold Bio-Rad Stock in Your Portfolio Now

headline: Here's Why You Should Retain Revvity Stock in Your Portfolio for Now
